title: 8 Best Money Market Accounts
content:
ableBanking, the online division of Maine-based Northeast Bank, offers the best interest rate on our list with an APY of 1.00%. 

The opening deposit is set at $250 and there's no required minimum balance or monthly maintenance fee. When you open a new account, ableBanking will make a $25 gift on your behalf to the charity or nonprofit of your choice. If you want to get more in interest while giving back, the ableBanking Money Market has what you're looking for. 
Which Money Market Account Should You Choose? 
These eight accounts each come with minimal fees, but deciding which one is best for you might require a little more digging on your part. 

Ultimately, it comes down to balancing out the best rate with the lowest monthly cost, based on how aggressive your savings goals are. If you want to take a closer look at how each of these accounts compares side by side, you'll find all the information you need right here on Credio . 

Compare Savings Accounts on Credio
